item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "Fell in love with a beautiful blonde once. Drove me to drink. And I never had the decency to thank her." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Yogi Berra
item.description: "You can observe a lot just by watching." -- Yogi Berra

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I just can't listen to any more Wagner, you know...I'm starting to get the urge to conquer Poland." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Phillip Shaw Pauadan
item.description: "At least 600,000 men died in the Civil War. Major battles numbered the dead in the thousands; even minor skirmishes killed hundreds...Then why study the death of thirteen men?... Mass death numbs the mind and heart as it numbers its vast toll. Relief from the horror is less possible when we watch old Joe Woods and thirteen-year-old David Shelton plead for life - and then die." -- Phillip Shaw Pauadan

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Cloudcover add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I am the literary equivalent of a Big Mac and fries." -- Stephen King
